modShortDescription: For fans of hardcore and unexpected situations. This mod removes the red zombie indicators from the compass during quests (the yellow indicators remain).
modDescription:
For fans of hardcore and unexpected situations.

This mod removes the red [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) indicators from the compass during quests (the yellow indicators remain). See screenshots of Before â€“ After.
